From: Yanshosh@...

The new rules, which the council has been working on for the past five
days, have been posted on the site (the rules section). The char
regulations apply on the 12th (so you guys have 6 days to kill off any
additional chars you have). The other rules come in effect NOW.
Everyone, go read the rules! We'll be hunting down and punishing
violators like crazy, so be sure to follow them :-)

All you peeps who were complainin' about the char limit, we made a
slight exception for you, though it's hard work. Anyways, check it
out, read carefully, and obey.


PS. Anyone who is not planning to have more than 16 chars, this battle
is a good opportunity to get a few of them killed.
